actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Senate, the House of Representatives, and Congressional committees to bring suits with respect to claims of executive privilege.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate, the House of Representatives, and congressional committees to bring suits with respect to claims of executive privilege. Grants the District Court for the District of Columbia original and exclusive jurisdiction of any such civil action.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Senate, the House of Representatives, and Congressional committees to bring suits with respect to claims of executive privilege.
